entry.title: Public Notice - Winston-Dillard Fire District No. 5 Regular Board Meeting
entry.summary:
WINSTON-DILLARD FIRE DISTRICT BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEETING NOTICE The Board of Winston-Dillard Fire District No. 5 will hold its Regular Board meeting at Winston Dillard Fire District located at 250 SE Main St. Winston, OR 97496 on Monday January 15, 2024, at 5:30 p.m. To comply with House Bill 2560, those that wish to participate can attend through videoconferencing or telephonically. If you plan on attending the meeting, please call the business office at 541-673-5503 during normal business hours prior to 4:00 p.m. on Monday January 15, 2024, for instructions. The Board agenda to include but not limited to:
Monthly Financials
The meeting location is accessible to persons with disabilities. A request for an interpreter for the hearing impaired or for other accommodations for persons with disabilities should be made at least 48 hours before the meeting to DCFD #2 at 541-673-5503.

entry.title: Public Notice - Central Douglas Fire & Rescue Authority Regular Board Meeting
entry.summary:
CENTRAL DOUGLAS FIRE & RESCUE AUTHORITY REGULAR BOARD MEETING NOTICE The Board of Directors of Central Douglas Fire & Rescue Authority will hold its Regular Board meeting at Winston Dillard Fire District located at 250 SE Main St. Winston, OR 97496 on Monday January 15, 2023, at 5:30 p.m. To comply with House Bill 2560, those that wish to participate can attend through videoconferencing or telephonically. If you plan on attending the meeting, please call the business office at 541-673-5503 during normal business hours prior to 4:00 p.m. on Monday January 15, 2023, for instructions. The Board agenda to include but not limited to:
Monthly Financials Chief’s Report
The meeting location is accessible to persons with disabilities. A request for an interpreter for the hearing impaired or for other accommodations for persons with disabilities should be made at least 48 hours before the meeting to administration at 541-673-5503.

entry.title: HOYLE, CARBAJAL INTRODUCE DASH ACT TO TACKLE HOUSING
entry.summary: January 15, 2024 10:40 a.m. On Thursday, 4th District Representative Val Hoyle and California Representative Salud Carbajal introduced the Decent, Affordable, Safe Housing for All (DASH) Act, a companion bill to Senator Ron Wyden’s legislation in the Senate. A release from Hoyle said the legislation aims to tackle homelessness and address the housing affordability crisis...

entry.title: FOUR CHAPLAINS CEREMONY SET FOR FEBRUARY 3RD
entry.summary: January 15, 2023 9:50 a.m. The Four Chaplains Ceremony is set for Saturday February 3rd.It is being held on the 81st anniversary of the sinking of the USAT Dorchester. This is the 12th year the event has been held in Roseburg. It will be hosted by Westside Christian Church on West Harvard Avenue. The Legion...

entry.title: OR 230 REOPENED BETWEEN DIAMOND LAKE JUNCTION AND UNION CREEK
entry.summary: January 15, 2024 9:20 a.m. Information from the Oregon Department of Transportation says OR 230 has reopened between Diamond Lake Junction and Union Creek. Drivers should be prepared for delays and chain restrictions. More road information is at www.tripcheck.com

entry.title: MORNING CONVERSATION 1.15.24
entry.summary: From Roseburg Dermatology, Dr. Kate Braunlich talks about her background, education, and plans for her practice as she begins talking patients in Roseburg. Click here to download for later listening: 830 1 15 23

entry.title: Pair arrested for alleged trespassing
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Roseburg Police Department jailed two people following an alleged trespass incident Thursday.

entry.title: Douglas Timber Operators host breakfast
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Douglas Timber Operators will have their monthly breakfast event at 8 a.m. Jan. 25.

entry.title: Double donation drive underway through March 4
entry.summary: ROSEBURG — Zonta Club of Roseburg has its Double Donation Drive underway through March 4th.
